Comment.Language: From the Paramoun of the Nativity to the Feast of the Circumcision:

Text.Language: Eyrenhwc e~rok: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma e#y#u#: je aumack akcw] m~mon.
That we may praise You: with Your good Father: and the Holy Spirit: for You were born and saved us.
لكي نسبحَكَ، مع ابيكَ الصالح، والروح القدس، لأنك ولدت وخلصتنا.

Comment.Language: From Paramoun of the Theophany until the 12th of Tobe:

Text.Language: Eyrenhwc e~rok: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma e#y#u#: je ak[iwmc akcw] m~mon.
That we may praise You: with Your good Father: and the Holy Spirit: for You were baptized and saved us.
لكي نسبحَكَ، مع ابيكَ الصالح، والروح القدس، لأنك أعتمدت وخلصتنا.

Comment.Language: On the two Feasts of the Cross, during Holy Pascha Week, and during funerals:

Text.Language: Eyrenhwc e~rok: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma e#y#u#: je auask akcw] m~mon.
That we may praise You: with Your good Father: and the Holy Spirit: for You were crucified and saved us.
لكي نسبحَكَ، مع ابيكَ الصالح، والروح القدس، لأنك صلبت وخلصتنا.
Eyrenhwc e~rok: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma e#y#u#: je aktwnk akcw] m~mon.
That we may praise You: with Your good Father: and the Holy Spirit: for You have risen and saved us.
لكي نسبحَكَ، مع ابيكَ الصالح، والروح القدس، لأنك قمت وخلصتنا.

Comment.Language: On standard days of the year and on fasting days:

Text.Language: Eyrenhwc e~rok: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma e#y#u#: je aki~ akcw] m~mon.
That we may praise You: with Your good Father: and the Holy Spirit: for You have come and saved us.
لكى نسبحك مع أبيك الصالح والروح القدس لأنك أتيت وخلصتنا.
